usefulItems: freezable containers (e.g. aluminium, silicone), cling film, freezer
title: Orange Sorbet with Sparkling Wine

ingredients.content: 600 g orange juice, freshly squeezed (7-9 oranges)

preparations.content: Place 120 g sparkling wine, 300 g orange juice and sugar in mixing bowl then cook <b>8 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.

Add remaining 300 g orange juice and mix <b>3 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer mixture up to 4 cm deep into freezable containers (e.g. aluminium, silicone) and cover with cling film. Cool mixture completely before freezing for at least 8 hours.

Cut frozen mixture into pieces (approx. 4 cm x 4 cm) with a long sharp knife. Place pieces in mixing bowl and crush with aid of spatula <b>30 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to wine glasses or champagne flutes and pour the remaining 630 g sparkling wine over the sorbet. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: For a non-alcoholic version replace the sparkling wine with sparkling water.
Replace the orange juice with another citrus juice (e.g. lemon, tangerine, grapefruit).
